Package index

All functions

c4a() c4a_ramp() c4a_na()
Get a cols4all color palette
c4a_citation()
Show how to cite palettes
c4a_data() c4a_load() c4a_data_as_is()
Build and load palette data
c4a_gui() c4a_table()
Graphical user interface to analyse palettes
c4a_info()
Get information from a cols4all palette
c4a_modify() c4a_duplicate()
Edit cols4all palettes (in development)
c4a_options()
Set cols4all options
c4a_palettes() c4a_series() c4a_types() c4a_overview() .P
Get available palette names and series
c4a_plot() c4a_plot_cvd() c4a_plot_hex()
Plot a color palette
c4a_scores()
Get information from a cols4all palette
c4a_sysdata_import() c4a_sysdata_export() c4a_sysdata_remove()
Import and export system data
